sentence.text: Meanwhile, mismatch repair rs175057 C>T locus was also associated with longer overall survival time in locally advanced rectal cancer (HR=0.44, 95% CI: 0.20-0.96, P=0.038), whereas MSH2 rs3771273 T>A, rs10188090 A>G and rs10191478 T>G loci were associated with shorter overall survival time (HR=1.74, 95% CI: 1.06-2.84, P=0.028; HR=1.64, 95% CI: 1.01-2.66, P=0.046; HR=1.71, 95% CI: 1.01-2.91, P=0.047, respectively).
